text: Gérard Guazzini (born 11 September 1966) is a French former professional racing cyclist. He rode the 1994 Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:People from Martigues Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Bouches-du-Rhône
title: Gérard Guazzini
